name: Black Licorice
description:
Do you want to play a game about trick-or-treaters?

Black Licorice is a short, seasonal horror visual novel. 

Play as a discontent trick-or-treater cutting through the woods on her way back home, and try to survive some very unusual happenings there. It's never a good thing to be all alone on Halloween...

This game features:

  • A main ending and a secret, alternate ending
  • Short playtime
  • Original artwork

This game was developed for Scream Jam 2020! Please note that while it likely won't be expanded in the future, it may receive updates for aesthetic and bug fixes.
